name: GastroBots
description:
'Job's not done 'til the animals are wrangled!' - Boss Bot

Gastrobots is a cute lil' arcade-puzzle game where you -- an adorable space-robo-cowboy -- save the Food Galaxy from being eaten by greedy space-robo-critters the only way you know how... Wranglin'!

*****

From the creators of Cows vs. Aliens and Ghostbusters: Paranormal Blast!

*****

GASTROBOTS FEATURES

- AMAZING GRAPHICS
You've never seen a game that looks as good as GastroBots!

- 150 ACTION-PACKED LEVELS
Easy to learn and super fun to play! Simple swipe controls are designed to work amazingly on your touch screen!

- EXPLORE 15 INCREDIBLE FOOD PLANETS
Travel from Bacon & Eggs, to the Fruit Salad, to Tacos to the Pizza Planet!

- CATCH DIFFERENT ANIMALS
Moops move slowly and group together! Sikka are fast and solitary creatures! Aligoxes will hunt and eat the other animals! Plus many more!

- SUPER-POWERED BOOSTS
Freeze animals in their tracks with the Freeze Boost or grab a Speed Boosts to become the fastest robot in the galaxy!

- 11 GAME-CHANGING PAINT JOBS
Party all night with the Disco Ball paint that doubles your speed! Find the coal and unlock the Diamond paint that can triple your points!

- AN UNBELIEVABLE NUMBER OF OUTFITS
Mix and match your outfits! Wear your Top Hat with a Cool Leather Coat! Try on a Moustache with your Cheerleader Uniform! Anything goes!

- FULL iCLOUD AND GAMECENTER ACHIEVEMENT SUPPORT
Easily sync and play GastroBots on all of your Apple devices!

- REGULAR FREE UPDATES
Get ready for free updates with new planets, new levels new boosts, new animals, and much more!

--

GET IT NOW!
